mapper.update:
update T_MAM_ALARM
ALARM_DATE = #{alarmDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
ALARM_name = #{alarmName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ALARM_LEVEL = #{alarmLevel,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
TUNNEL_ID = #{tunnelId,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
OBJECT_ID = #{objectId,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
object_name = #{objectName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
is_distribute = #{isDistribute,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
DESCRIPTION = #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
cleaned = #{cleaned,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
cleaned_DATE = #{cleanedDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
alarm_source = #{alarmSource},
longitude = #{longitude},
latitude = #{latitude},
where ID = #{id,jdbcType=DECIMAL}

update T_MAM_ALARM set ALARM_DATE = #{alarmDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, ALARM_name = #{alarmName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ALARM_LEVEL = #{alarmLevel,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, TUNNEL_ID = #{tunnelId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, OBJECT_ID = #{objectId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, OBJECT_name = #{objectName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, is_distribute = #{isDistribute,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, DESCRIPTION = #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, cleaned = #{cleaned,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, cleaned_DATE = #{cleanedDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, alarm_source = #{alarmSource}, longitude = #{longitude}, latitude = #{latitude} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=DECIMAL}
